metadata.title: CVE-2014-7831 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: lib/classes/grades_external.php in Moodle 2.7.x before 2.7.3 does notconsider the moodle/grade:viewhidden capability before displaying hiddengrades, which allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitiveinformation by leveraging the student role to access the get_grades webservice.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
